Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory155.png'}
{3: 'All of you have brought your crafts with you when you meet again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Let me see... Woah, they look amazing!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Excellent, it can surely pass the pre-selection. Come, this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Just hand in your crafts, and you'll get the VIP tickets.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Time to watch the mechanic puppet show.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Wouldn't it be a pity if some art forms were only stored as data? It's the mission of Kowloong to recreate them in the real world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Besides, it can attract more guests this way. Pretty smart plan, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Led by the three, you and the others make your way to the pre-selection stage and exchange the crafts for VIP tickets.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Great, we've passed the pre-selection.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I know you'll make it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The four of you put the tickets on the machine. The light curtain in the front melts, revealing a glittering stage.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory157.png'}
{3: 'A mechanical puppet is spinning a wooden wheel in the middle of the stage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Just in time, the show has just started.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What is that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'A spinning wheel, which is used to spin threads according to the records in the data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'In the past, people needed to use the spinning wheel to twist the materials into a string before weaving them into cloth.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'The mechanical puppet who is spinning threads stands up with the music, and follows several similarly dressed mechanical puppets up the steps projecting the clouds. The surrounding scenery changes into a lake.'}
{3: 'Gradually, people with different expressions gather around the stage. They all remain quiet while watching the mechanical puppets perform.'}
{3: 'The spinning mechanical puppet falls in love with a shabby-looking puppet, but the two of them are forced to separate amidst a thunderstorm on the stage.'}
{3: 'To get together again, the puppet slaughters a mechanical cow and tears off its cowhide. Having given up everything, he runs to the sky with his child.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Poor them... Why can't people who love each other be reunited, even in a story?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because stories are based on reality.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Based on reality...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yazi', 3: "It's the same way in reality. People who love each other will always be separated.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yazi has been standing behind everyone for some time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: '...The same happened to "Qu".', 4: '1'}
{2: "If there's a choice...", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: "Indeed. If they had a choice, they'd be standing here today.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yazi turns back. Her mask is silent like a rock smoothed out by a river stream, hiding all emotions beneath it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "If there's a choice...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv recites the sentence silently, as if remembering something of the past that she does not want to recall.'}
{3: 'The mechanical puppets on the stage are separated by the Milky Way amidst the sad music, creeping on the shore, trying to reach out to each other.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yazi', 3: 'The story was set from the moment they were born as the cowherd and the weaving maid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: "They think they can change the future through their struggles, but the truth is that they've merely chosen the path that hurts the least.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: 'Or, the path that must be trodden, no matter the cost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you talking about "Qu"?', 3: '55', 4: 'Is this about you?', 5: '55'}
{3: 'The floor of the stage turns into a bridge made of magpies in the projection. Upon such a touching scene, Yazi lets out a bitter smile.'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: "Is it important? They'll never be apart anymore, yet I'll always be here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanical puppets hug and cry on the magpie bridge. The audience under the stage bursts into applause. Eventually, some begin to stand up and leave.'}
{2: 'Never be apart...?', 3: '59'}
{3: 'Yazi does not answer your question. She simply joins the crowd of departing people.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Though the M.I.N.D. of "Qu" and Huaxu were damaged, they were also merged in such a way that\'s inseparable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is that freedom?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'They made their choice.', 3: '64'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Even if it means they have to end up like this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv lowers her head thoughtfully.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's on your mind?", 3: '68'}
{3: 'She looks up with a gentle, but enigmatic smile.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "At least... not now. I can't tell you something uncertain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Feel free to tell me...', 3: '76', 4: "Whenever you're ready.", 5: '76'}
{3: 'At this moment, a loud discussion breaks out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The lucky draw is about to begin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A projection screen rises in the middle of the stage, gradually revealing the list of prizes for this draw.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There are ten Lucky Prizes... the winners can choose any two pieces of crafts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "Aren't those the crafts we handed over? What's the point?"}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "Because it's just the Lucky Prize, I guess."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The third prize seems to be the chance to shake hands with Miss Pulao.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Haha... It's just to... save money.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "That's the third prize?"}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "I'll have it if you don't want it. I'd love to meet the Kowloong Crew!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The second prize is a collection of guqin pieces played by Yazi herself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: 'Hey! Look at the first prize!'}
{3: 'The first prize on the screen is, as Changyu originally said, a million grubs.'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "That's miles different from the other prizes!"}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "It's the prize that drew me to make the craft!"}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "Please, let it be me. Come on, ticket, you're the hope I've been waiting for!"}
{3: 'However, underneath the text "A Million Grubs" seems to be a small line of fine print.'}
{2: '"Only if certain conditions are met."', 3: '101', 4: '...?', 5: '101'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Please... please don't be 【kuroname】...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao folds her hands, as if praying for something.'}
{3: 'Afterward, the lotto numbers chosen by the ticket holders appear on the screen one after another, and the crowd falls silent.'}
{2: 'System Notice', 3: 'Announcing the winners of the ten Lucky Prizes!'}
{3: 'With ten numbers appearing on the screen, murmurs arise in the crowd.'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: 'Well, better than nothing.'}
{2: 'Crowds', 3: "Let's go."}
{3: "The winners of the third and second prizes are then revealed. None of the Gray Ravens' ticket numbers are shown on the screen."}
{2: 'System Notice', 3: 'Announcing the winner of the first prize! Who is our lucky person going to be?'}
{3: 'The projection screen flashes up in a dazzling light. After a burst of music, an unfamiliar number appears in the center.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The odds are just too small based on the number of people participating in the lucky draw.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Better luck next time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crowd leaves in sighs. Changyu and Sophia stand up and wave at Pulao.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Good, now it's a sure bet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I'll leave the award ceremony to you. After all, you're the only one who can control it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After the two leave, Pulao sighs in relief and steps onto the stage to greet the winning craftsman.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "...Let's congratulate our lucky winner.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Slightly nervous, she welcomes the winner onto the stage.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Please welcome the presenters...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Several heavily armored mechanical guards step on the stage.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Now, a million grubs will be yours after you defeat them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Winner', 3: "What's that about? I've never heard of such a requirement!"}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Y-you just didn't pay attention, you see?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Look, it clearly says here that "Only if certain conditions are met"!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Winner', 3: 'Who would notice the fine print! You scammers!'}
{2: 'Winner', 3: 'Nobody can survive fighting that many mechanical guards! Keep your prize!'}
{3: 'He stomps off the stage in a fury, throwing the ticket away and leaving the place.'}
{2: '(Pick up the ticket)', 3: '1444'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "No, no, noooo, it's not yours.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "What are you...?! Next time... I'll apply a real-name system!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Now, let's go claim the prize.", 3: '150'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Copy, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
